descriptions: Refactored configuration consistency by consolidating redundant EnableRadar and enableRadar toggles into a single Config.NUI source of truth
Optimized Radar, Bodycam, and Badge components with early-return logic to completely stop script execution when features are disabled
Added new enableBodycam and enableBadge configuration options allowing for complete disablement of these subsystems
Fixed client-side data injection ensuring the correct confirmation flags are passed to the NUI without duplications
Cleaned up NUI production code by removing debug console logs and standardizing code formatting across React components
